TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_mahedaw, title = mahedaw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/mahedaw} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:遺失) makakilim tu wawa mahedaw. 尋找他遺失的孩子. tanuangic sa ciniza a mahedaw ku nani'. .
(kamo no holam:遺失) makakilim to wawa mahedaw. 尋找他遺失的孩子. tanoangic sa ciniza a mahedaw ko nani'. .
